In England, in the seven days to 17 March, there were 454,633 new confirmed cases (803.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 March, there were 307,540 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 48% (147,093 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 March is 17,191,749 (30,400.9 cases per 100,000 population).
